import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { ShopOwnerService } from './ShopOwner.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shop-owner-root', templateUrl: './ShopOwner.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ShopOwner.component.scss'] }) export class ShopOwnerComponent implements OnInit { title = 'shopowners'; shopOwners: any[] = []; shopOwnerToUpdate: any = { id: null, name: '', shopName: '', contactInfo: '' }; constructor(private shopOwnerService: ShopOwnerService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getShopOwners(); } // Register a new Shop Owner register(registerForm: NgForm): void { this.shopOwnerService.registerShopOwners(registerForm.value).subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log('Shop Owner registered:', response); registerForm.reset(); this.getShopOwners(); }, (error: any) => { console.error('Error registering Shop Owner:', error); } ); } // Get all Shop Owners getShopOwners(): void { this.shopOwnerService.getShopOwners().subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log('Fetched Shop Owners:', response); if (Array.isArray(response)) { this.shopOwners = response.map(shopOwner => ({ id: shopOwner.id || shopOwner.ShopOwnerId || null, name: shopOwner.name || '', shopName: shopOwner.shopName || '', contactInfo: shopOwner.contactInfo || '' })); } else { console.error('Unexpected response structure:', response); } }, (error: any) => { console.error('Error fetching shop owners:', error); } ); } // Delete a Shop Owner deleteShopOwner(shopOwner: any): void { if (!shopOwner?.id) { console.error('Shop Owner ID is undefined. Cannot delete shop owner.'); return; } this.shopOwnerService.deleteShopOwners(shopOwner.id).subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log('Shop Owner deleted:', response); this.getShopOwners(); }, (error: any) => { console.error('Error deleting Shop Owner:', error); } ); } // Edit a Shop Owner edit(shopOwner: any): void { this.shopOwnerToUpdate = { ...shopOwner }; } // Update a Shop Owner updateShopOwner(): void { if (!this.shopOwnerToUpdate?.id) { console.error('Shop Owner ID is missing. Cannot update.'); return; } this.shopOwnerService.updateShopOwners(this.shopOwnerToUpdate).subscribe( (response: any) => { console.log('Shop Owner updated:', response); this.getShopOwners(); }, (error: any) => { console.error('Error updating Shop Owner:', error); } ); } }
